title: NComboboxProps
description: Props for the NCombobox component. A searchable dropdown that supports single or multiple selection with type-ahead filtering.

value.description: The option value used for form submission

label.description: The display label shown to the user

placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown when no option is selected

multiple.description: Whether multiple options can be selected simultaneously

searchable.description: Whether the user can type to filter options

className.description: Additional CSS class names for custom styling
